meta-review.comment: Astro Bot Rescue Mission is an incredibly fun and engaging platformer that truly shines in VR. The game's natural implementation of virtual reality and inventive level design make it a must-have for PSVR owners. It successfully delivers a genuinely new and exciting experience within a familiar genre, showcasing the potential of VR gaming. It's a simple concept that works on so many levels, and at its price point, it's an absolute bargain for the quality and enjoyment it offers.
